name: backendapi-fastapi-shim
description: Shim for preview runners that insist on npm; proxies to bash start.sh to launch FastAPI via uvicorn on port 3001.

scripts.start: echo "[BackendAPI] npm shim invoked. Working dir: $(pwd). Effective command: bash start.sh" && bash start.sh
scripts.start:dev: echo "[BackendAPI] npm start:dev shim -> bash start.sh" && bash start.sh
